sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger➛Adopting User Record➛Name,

Your adoption request has been accepted and your meeting to adopt Trigger➛Adopting User Record➛Select from available pets➛Name has been scheduled at Trigger➛Adopting User Record➛Select from available pets➛Adoption Center➛Name on Trigger➛Adopting User Record➛Choose time and date to schedule meeting.

 

Regards,

Pawppointment
